sentence.Network_en: I eulogize the tall and straight trunk of the white poplar.
sentence.Network_cn: 我赞美白杨树那挺拔的树干.

sentence.Network_en: I am not a poet, I can't use my beautiful poems to eulogize our school.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不是一个诗人, 我不能用我的美丽的诗歌颂我们的学校.

sentence.Network_en: Why should we not eulogize the proletariat, the Communist Party, New Democracy and socialism?
sentence.Network_cn: 无产阶级, 共产党, 新民主主义,社会主义,为什么不应该歌颂 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赞_百度百科 ... (3) 司仪[ master of ceremonies] (1) 称赞;颂扬[ praise;eulogize] (3) 辅佐,帮助[ assist].
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... eu- 表示"好，优秀" eulogize 赞美 euphemism 委婉的词语.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... eulogy n 颂辞，称赞 eulogize v 称赞 philology n 语言学.
颂_百度百科 ... 4、 占兆之词[ divination] 1、 歌颂[ eulogize；extol；laud；praise] 4、 通“诵”。朗读[ read loudly].

list.abs: If you once eulogized the daybreak , then also asked yours to hug the dark night ., 如果你曾歌颂黎明 , 那麽也请你拥抱黑夜.
I eulogize the tall and straight trunk of the我赞美白杨树那挺拔的株干
It can surmount obstacles , eulogize differences , stimulate inspirations and bring about instructive effects and wealth ., 它可以跨越障碍 , 颂扬差异 , 激发灵感 , 带来教益 , 创造财富.
The fallen soldiers were eulogized as heroes ., 阵亡的士兵被颂扬为英雄.

entry.def: If you eulogize someone or something, you praise them very highly.

example.ex: Barry Davies eulogized Keegan's part in the operation...
example.tran: 巴里·戴维斯盛赞基根在行动中发挥的作用。
泰勒称赞史蒂文多才多艺。

entry.tran: （通常指在葬礼上）念悼词称赞，为…念悼文
entry.def: If you eulogize someone who has died, you make a speech praising them, usually at their funeral.

example.ex: Leaders from around the world eulogized the Egyptian president.
example.tran: 全世界的领导人都致悼词称颂那位埃及总统。

sentences.sentence: "The dead woman was eulogized at the funeral"

stems_affixes.word_buile: eu好,优秀+phon声音+ious……的→声音好听的
eu好,优秀+phor带来+ia……的→带来美好→愉快
eu好,优秀+gen产出+ics学科→产生优秀[后代]→优生学
eu好,优秀+phem讲话+ism行为等→讲好话
eu好,优秀+log说+ize表动词→说好话

sentences.en: Critics everywhere have eulogized her new novel.
sentences.cn: 各处的评论家都称赞她的新小说。

sentences.en: The fallen soldiers were eulogized as heroes.
sentences.cn: 阵亡的士兵被颂扬为英雄。
